features: CONVENIENT: 2 compartments to keep pacifiers separated and clean
PORTABLE: includes silicone strap for hanging off a stroller or diaper bag
CLEAN: keeps pacifiers clean, ready to use & easily accessible
EASY-TO-USE: snap closure for simple one-hand access
DISHWASHER-SAFE: place on top rack of dishwasher for easy clean
DIMENSIONS: 2.75" H x 3" D x 3.5" W
body.description: The Ubbi On-the-Go Pacifier Holder keeps pacifiers clean and accessible while you’re out and about! Equipped with 2 compartments to keep the pacifiers separated and a silicone strap for easy hanging from a stroller or diaper bag. The pacifier holder is compact and easily snaps open and close and is easy to clean as well as dishwasher safe. About us: Ubbi is a globally recognized brand, designing innovative and creative products with parents and children in mind. Under the Ubbi name, you will find unique, quality products that are easy to use, and simplify parents’ lives while keeping babies happy and safe as can be. Our steel, odor locking diaper pail was a first on the market in 2011, and has become our flagship item. With the same customer focused philosophy and innovative design capabilities, we have expanded into a variety of product categories: feeding, modern and trendy on-the-go items, bath toys and functional accessories. From concept to final creation, the Ubbi team works together every step of the way to bring the best in design and value. Item Dimensions: 2.75" H x 3" D x 3.5" W

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for keep the pacifier clean and handy, I really like it, is big enough and looks really great on the diaper bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Avent Soothie perfectly.
reviews.reviewText: This case fits 2 Avent Soothie pacifiers perfectly. It is a bit bulky, but I’d rather this than two smooshed pacifiers. I like that they are carried separately, so the pacifiers aren’t touching. It is also very easy to clean as it is a hard surface. It’s been consistently used for 2 months so far, and hangs on a loop outside the diaper bag and each compartment door still feels just as secure as when I first purchased it. Perfect price!

reviews.reviewerName: Erin Kiu, Blogger & Author at Fun & Holy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this pacificer holder, especially when on the go. I like that it's easy to attach to my car seat, stroller, or diaper bag. Love how it has 2 separate compartments, so if one pacificer gets dirty, it's separate from the clean one. Fits the philips avent pacificer nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t think I’d need it but definitely comes in handy! Very durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipe holder is great, pacifier holder is a bit too bulky
reviews.reviewText: Wipes container: Keeps wipes wet and does not leak. And it is cute! It's perfect. I love that there is a removable silicone strap as wellPacifier holder: This product is a bit bulky and heavy. It just takes up a bit more space in the diaper bag than I would like. Otherwise, it works fine. I like that is can fit two pacifiers and can be washed in the dishwasher easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Best storage for pacifiers on-the-go!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this product!! I hated letting my son's binkies touch any kind of surface. It was so hard to sanitize when we were out and about. I used to put the binkies into ziplock bags and then into his diaper bag, but they were so hard to find when I needed them! I specifically bought this pacifier holder with the virus in mind. It's a very thick, durable plastic that makes it easy to sanitize compared to the cloth pods. It attaches to the diaper bag easily and I have no fear of it falling off or coming undone. It's got two separate compartments to store two different pacifiers. Super easy to get to when needed. The compartments are big enough to fit all kinds of pacifiers. We have all our pacifiers on lanyards and they fit into these compartments with the lanyards on them as well!The only con I have for this product is that it is sorta heavy and bulky compared to the cloth pods. It also doesn't have any sort of design or pattern (but I like plain anyhow.)Definitely recommend to all my mommas!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and durable
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t think I would need this but now that I do, I realize I wished I had gotten this for my previous children. I used to just deal with a ziploc bag or using Avent pacifiers and its carrying case to haul the pacifiers while going out. My newborn prefers the itzy ritzy pacies so I needed a bigger container. This fits really well and has a lovely silicone strap to hang onto my baby bag. Very easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Super durable, quality is excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love that you can keep 2 pacifiers in here in comparison with almost every other brand that only has room for one
Serves its purpose - works well, easy to clean etc.
Buen material, lo meto al esterilizador junto con los chupones y aguanta bastante. Me ayuda a mantener limpios y tener opcion de 2 chupones por si uno se cae o ensucia
I was pleasantly surprised by the durability and quality once I opened it! Got it strapped to my diaper bag! Love that it holds two separately and can always have a clean back up on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So convenient, fits nicely on buggy, keeps them clean when out and about. Worth every penny!!
